changeSet.author: ge65cer
changeSet.comment: Fill the learning_goal_exercise table with relations currently stored in the learning_goal_lecture_unit table.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO learning_goal_exercise (learning_goal_id, exercise_id) SELECT lg.learning_goal_id, lu.exercise_id FROM learning_goal_lecture_unit lg LEFT JOIN lecture_unit lu ON lu.id = lg.lecture_unit_id WHERE lu.discriminator = "E";

changeSet.author: ge65cer
changeSet.comment: Remove all relations between exercise units and learning goals from the learning_goal_lecture_unit table.
changeSet.sql: DELETE lg FROM learning_goal_lecture_unit lg JOIN lecture_unit lu ON lg.lecture_unit_id = lu.id WHERE lu.discriminator = "E";
